svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - June 22 2024
June 22 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 22, 2024" date: "2024-06-22"
Eth News and Links
Blob fee market issues, SEC drops Consensys case and CertiK withdrew ~$3M from Kraken without authorization
All core devs
â€¢ All core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) #190 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: pectra-devnet-1 : aim to launch next week with subset of
clients, will include execution layer triggered withdrawals & current version of EIP7702 EIP7702 : discussion of delegation designation
proposal (revoke by redelegating), breakout #5 June 26 EOF : rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade, EOF readiness tracker
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade: pectra-devnet-1 : aim to launch next week with subset of clients, will include execution layer
triggered withdrawals & current version of EIP7702 EIP7702 : discussion of delegation designation proposal (revoke by redelegating),
breakout #5 June 26 EOF : rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade, EOF readiness tracker
â€¢ pectra-devnet-1 : aim to launch next week with subset of clients, will include execution layer triggered withdrawals & current version
of EIP7702
pectra-devnet-1 : aim to launch next week with subset of clients, will include execution layer triggered withdrawals & current version of
EIP7702
â€¢ EIP7702 : discussion of delegation designation proposal (revoke by redelegating), breakout #5 June 26
: discussion of delegation designation proposal (revoke by redelegating), breakout #5 June 26
â€¢ EOF : rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade, EOF readiness tracker
EOF : rebasing to build on top of Prague upgrade, EOF readiness tracker
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
â€¢ Frangio: ERC721/1155 issue with EOF , safe transfer checks if token recipient is a contract using code size
Osaka + F starname upgrade
â€¢ Verkle implementers call #19 : transition tests mostly passing on Geth, support increasing code size limit, testnet relaunch targeting
July & preimage distribution discussion
â€¢ transition tests mostly passing on Geth, support increasing code size limit, testnet relaunch targeting July & preimage distribution
discussion
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.78% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.78% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Consensus layer: Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
Consensus layer: Prysm 38%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Blob fee market issues, highlighted by price spike : Potuz: market for blobs is broken Terence: ideas to fix Data viz of slot inclusion
rates and analysis of blob market strategies
Blob fee market issues, highlighted by price spike :
â€¢ Potuz: market for blobs is broken
Potuz: market for blobs is broken
â€¢ Terence: ideas to fix
Terence: ideas to fix
â€¢ Data viz of slot inclusion rates and analysis of blob market strategies
Data viz of slot inclusion rates and analysis of blob market strategies

Dankrad: blob strategies to help self builders

â€¢ ePBS breakout #3
ePBS breakout #3

Research
â€¢ Anders Elowsson: analysis of burn incentives in MEV pricing auctions
Anders Elowsson: analysis of burn incentives in MEV pricing auctions
â€¢ Fork-choice enforced inclusion lists (FOCIL): committee-based inclusion list design
Fork-choice enforced inclusion lists (FOCIL): committee-based inclusion list design
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm v5.0.4 : fixes p2p peer for Windows users, Beacon API retrieving old blobs & initial sync avoids redundant blob
downloads Teku v24.6.0 : performance improvements & fixes; v24.6.1 : fix for v24.6.0 startup failure
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Prysm v5.0.4 : fixes p2p peer for Windows users, Beacon API retrieving old blobs & initial sync avoids redundant blob downloads
Prysm v5.0.4 : fixes p2p peer for Windows users, Beacon API retrieving old blobs & initial sync avoids redundant blob downloads
â€¢ Teku v24.6.0 : performance improvements & fixes; v24.6.1 : fix for v24.6.0 startup failure
Teku v24.6.0 : performance improvements & fixes; v24.6.1 : fix for v24.6.0 startup failure
â€¢ Execution layer: Nethermind v1.27.0 : ~150% improvement to block processing & intra-block cache
Execution layer:
â€¢ Nethermind v1.27.0 : ~150% improvement to block processing & intra-block cache
For Stakers
â€¢ Lighthouse: guide to missed attestations , common issues & tuning parameters
EIPs/Standards

â€¢ EIP discussions proposal, highlight updates, reviews & outstanding issues

Stuff for developers
â€¢ Foundry afterInvariant hooks: test state at end of an invariant test run
Foundry afterInvariant hooks: test state at end of an invariant test run
â€¢ Transience (Solidity library): manage transient storage
Transience (Solidity library): manage transient storage
â€¢ Vyper v0.4.0 : adds module system (code reuse via composition), Venom optimizer pipeline & archive creation of a build for sharing
Vyper v0.4.0 : adds module system (code reuse via composition), Venom optimizer pipeline & archive creation of a build for sharing
â€¢ Sneko : terminal GUI for compiling Vyper & Solidity contracts
Sneko : terminal GUI for compiling Vyper & Solidity contracts
â€¢ Alloy v0.1 : rewrite of ethers-rs & Solidity type system in Rust
Alloy v0.1 : rewrite of ethers-rs & Solidity type system in Rust
â€¢ Revmc : EVM bytecode to native code compiler
Revmc : EVM bytecode to native code compiler
â€¢ ethPandaOps: build an L2 devnet using Kurtosis ethereum-package
ethPandaOps: build an L2 devnet using Kurtosis ethereum-package
â€¢ Viem NonceManager : manage/generate nonces for a local accounts transactions Deployless Calls : call a function on a contract that
hasnâ€™t been deployed
Viem
â€¢ NonceManager : manage/generate nonces for a local accounts transactions
NonceManager : manage/generate nonces for a local accounts transactions
â€¢ Deployless Calls : call a function on a contract that hasnâ€™t been deployed
Deployless Calls : call a function on a contract that hasnâ€™t been deployed
â€¢ Vacp2p stealth address kit v0.2.0 : adds pallas & vesta, bw6_761 & baby_jub_jub curves
Vacp2p stealth address kit v0.2.0 : adds pallas & vesta, bw6_761 & baby_jub_jub curves
â€¢ Relayscan bids archive : builder bids for all relays, uploaded nightly, CC0 license
Relayscan bids archive : builder bids for all relays, uploaded nightly, CC0 license
Security
â€¢ Kraken balance inflation vulnerability disclosed & patched CertiK withdrew ~$3M over 5 days before reporting, funds now returned
â€¢ CertiK withdrew ~$3M over 5 days before reporting, funds now returned
Ecosystem
â€¢ Devcon: ticket raffle & auction live on Arbitrum, 20 tickets for highest auction bids, 184 tickets for raffle winners, minimum entry is
0.08 ETH
Enterprise
â€¢ Enterprise Ethereum Alliance: survey on business usage of Ethereum
Job Listings
â€¢ Alchemy - Wallet Services: Engineering Manager and Full-Stack Engineer
Alchemy - Wallet Services: Engineering Manager and Full-Stack Engineer

Marketing Manager
Nethermind: Preconfirmations Senior Engineer , Protocol Researcher , Site Reliability Engineer , Senior Content Marketing & Senior
â€¢ IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
IMC: Quant Developer for DeFi and MEV focused team
â€¢ Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
Privacy and Scaling Explorations: ZK Circuits Engineer
â€¢ Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator and Senior Web3 Software Dev (Wallet)
Gnosis is hiring: Discord Moderator and Senior Web3 Software Dev (Wallet)
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 1.9 to 95.6 gwei, 6.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei Blob gas: spiked to 8,405 gwei;
251 ETH burnt 12.5k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 1.9 to 95.6 gwei, 6.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.5 gwei

â€¢ Blob gas: spiked to 8,405 gwei; 251 ETH burnt
Blob gas: spiked to 8,405 gwei; 251 ETH burnt
â€¢ 12.5k ETH net issuance this week
12.5k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $3,387 - $3,632, currently $3,511, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $3,387 - $3,632, currently $3,511, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.055 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ SEC formally notifies Consensys that it will not be charged
SEC formally notifies Consensys that it will not be charged
â€¢ Fortune : CFTC probing Jump Crypto
Fortune : CFTC probing Jump Crypto
